solution_line_template: They can buy {ounces_of_helium} ounces of helium because {money_for_helium} / {helium_cost_per_ounce} = <<{money_for_helium}/{helium_cost_per_ounce}={ounces_of_helium}>>{ounces_of_helium}
They can fly {total_feet_flown} feet up because {ounces_of_helium} x {feet_per_ounce} = <<{ounces_of_helium}*{feet_per_ounce}={total_feet_flown}>>{total_feet_flown}
